description:
Updated with upcycling, these running socks are just as comfortable as their predecessors, but have a smaller footprint. Run through the kilometers with your toes spread. These running toe socks minimize friction and moisture build-up while letting your toes splay naturally for comfort. A supportive arch and seamless construction allows you to put in the distance without slippage or discomfort.

  • COOLMAX® EcoMade fibres use upcycled fabric scraps and recycled PET bottles to provide the same wicking and quick drying properties, just with a smaller impact
  • Mesh top provides breathability and ventilation
  • Arch support for secure and stable fit
  • Heel tabs reduce chafing and keep the socks from slipping into your shoes
  • Anatomical right and left foot design enhances fit
name: Injinji Run Lightweight No Show Coolmax Socks - Unisex
